Text: Total Capital Deployedis a calculation of your Total Capital deployed building from equity for the years and Rick Causey has asked me to present this Total Capital broken down between the following categories Strategic Pipelines Strategic Power Plants Strategic Communications Strategic Other Subdivide as you like Merchant Not included in the attached numbers are off balance sheet items Please give a summary of any off balance sheet items The capital presented is estimated from the plans recently submitted I am not looking for total precision just good estimates I need this information early next week It will be used in a board presentation Thanks for your help mike d

Cash Flow Reporting and ForecastingRod Karen Myer is setting up some meetings between Rick Causey myself and some of the business units I just wanted to let you know a little more about those meetings The purpose is to discuss Enrons plans to step up our cash flow reporting and forecasting effort We have some ideas and would like to bounce those off you and see what ETS is currently doing and how that fits into our consolidated plan Please bring whoever who think would be beneficial mike d

RE Budget for Enron Net Workspst Sounds good The only thing I have scheduled now is a on Thursday Let me know when you want to meet mike d Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Wednesday January PM To Deville Mike Cc Piper Greg Roper Kerry Subject FW Budget for Enron Net Works Mike Do you have time to get together on Thursday to review the budget data that you have in hand Assumptions regarding number of employees within business units and the timing of the sale or shutdown of certain lines of business have a direct impact on the ENW revised budget for Sally Original Message From Causey Richard Sent Wednesday January PM To Beck Sally Subject RE Budget for Enron Net Works You should get the latest from Mike Deville Hopefully they are very accurate as we are using them for the DIP lending process Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Wednesday January PM To Causey Richard Cc Piper Greg Subject FW Budget for Enron Net Works Rick Do you feel that the revised budgets that your team has received are baked enough so that it makes sense for us to relook at the ENW budget in light of revised plans for the various business units My understanding is that the business plans that Jim Fallon had asked the various wholesale business units to complete by December have not yet been submitted to Jim Which would lead me to ask whether or not the revised budgets that you have are far enough along in the process for us to use in reevaluating the ENW budget Let me know your thoughts on your degree of comfort with the revised budgets and who on your staff we could work with to get the necessary information to rework the ENW budget if necessary Thanks Sally Original Message From McMahon Jeffrey Sent Tuesday January PM To Beck Sally Subject RE Budget for Enron Net Works Yesthey have all been completed Pls get with someone in Causeys world to get the details Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Mon PM To McMahon Jeffrey Cc Piper Greg Subject Budget for Enron Net Works ENW submitted our preliminary revised budget two weeks ago In our meeting in the Board Room we did acknowledge that the ENW budget is very dependent upon the business plans of the business units that we support Since our budget meeting was the first that you conducted we agreed that the ENW revised budget would need to be reviewed again once the business plans and associated budgets for other Enron business units were completed Has that process been completed such that we can now reevaluate the budget for ENW I will follow up with you or someone on your staff on January so that we can complete this budget process I hope that you and your family enjoyed the holidays Sally
